tool.name: ShigaPass - a tool to predict Shigella serotypes
tool.command: #if $shigapass_db makeblastdb -in "$shigapass_db" -title shigapass -dbtype nucl && \ ShigaPass.sh "$input1" --blast_db "$shigapass_db" > "$output1" #else shigapass "$input1" > "$output1" #end if
tool.help:
Usage: shigapass [OPTIONS] [FASTA]...
Welcome to shigapass.
Usage:
shigapass in.fasta > out.tsv
